divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter and i we're driving down our driveway when she asked me if that was a ufo? I stopped my truck and grabbed my cell phone. She ran in house to get hers. We watched it slowly moving just above school and then it stopped, completely turned aeound and went back another direction. It seemed to know we were watching it. I tried to video tape and take pictures my phone went black. I got none. My daughter took pictures and hers turned out nothing but static. We live close to a air force base and we see alot of planes day and night but this didn't look or act like anyxplane either of us has seen before. My a daughter only seen the lights at the back.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Palermo
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Slowly flying then stopped.xompletly turned and went back another direction
